description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，滇军著名将领。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and a notable commander in the Yunnan Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于云南省的清末教育机构。
description.en: An educational institution in Yunnan Province during the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由孙中山等组织的革命团体。
description.en: A revolutionary organization founded by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 范石生的世交，曾介绍范石生加入蔡锷部。
description.en: A family friend of Fan Shisheng who introduced him to join Cai E's forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年军事家，护国战争的主要组织者和领导者。
description.en: A Chinese military leader in the early Republic of China, and a major organizer and leader of the National Protection War.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初时期中国著名军事院校之一。
description.en: One of the renowned military academies in China during the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领，与范石生、朱德等人为云南陆军讲武堂同学并结为兄弟。
description.en: A general of the Yunnan Army, a classmate and sworn brother of Fan Shisheng, Zhu De, and others at the Yunnan Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领，与范石生、朱德等人结为兄弟。后在范石生军内任前敌总指挥时被刺杀。
description.en: A general of the Yunnan Army and a sworn brother of Fan Shisheng, Zhu De, and others. He was later assassinated while serving as the frontline commander in Fan Shisheng's army.

description.zh-cn: 1911年在昆明爆发的旨在响应武昌起义的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising in Kunming in 1911 in response to the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领，曾为范石生的上级，后被唐继尧击败身亡。
description.en: A general of the Yunnan Army, formerly Fan Shisheng's superior, who was later defeated and killed by Tang Jiyao.

description.zh-cn: 为反对袁世凯称帝而发动的内战。
description.en: A civil war launched to oppose Yuan Shikai's proclamation as Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期以云南籍军人为主组成的地方军队。
description.en: A regional army in the Republic of China era, primarily composed of soldiers from Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 滇系军阀首领，曾长期统治云南。
description.en: The leader of the Yunnan clique of warlords, who ruled Yunnan for an extended period.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领，曾维护与顾品珍发生矛盾的范石生。
description.en: A general of the Yunnan Army who defended Fan Shisheng during his conflict with Gu Pinzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命的伟大先行者，中华民国的缔造者。
description.en: A great pioneer of the modern democratic revolution in China and the founder of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领，顾品珍死后任副总司令，曾与范石生一同主张讨伐陈炯明。
description.en: A general of the Yunnan Army. After Gu Pinzhen's death, he served as deputy commander-in-chief and, along with Fan Shisheng, advocated for a punitive expedition against Chen Jiongming.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期军事及政治人物，曾与孙中山合作，后又反目。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China era, who once cooperated with Sun Yat-sen but later became his opponent.

description.zh-cn: 1922年陈炯明在广州发动的反对孙中山的兵变。
description.en: A mutiny launched by Chen Jiongming in Guangzhou in 1922 against Sun Yat-sen.

en: 16th Army of the National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 由范石生部改编而成的国民革命军部队。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army formed by reorganizing Fan Shisheng's troops.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由中国国民党发起的针对中国共产党员及其同情者的政治清洗运动。
description.en: A political purge campaign initiated by the Kuomintang in 1927 targeting members and sympathizers of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期政治家及军事家，曾任中国国民党总裁、国民政府主席、中华民国总统等职。
description.en: A statesman and military leader of the Republic of China, who served as Director-General of the Kuomintang, Chairman of the Nationalist Government, and President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1928年4月，朱德、陈毅率领的南昌起义余部及湘南农军与毛泽东率领的秋收起义部队在井冈山的会合。
description.en: The meeting of the remaining forces of the Nanchang Uprising led by Zhu De and Chen Yi and the Hunan peasants' army with the Autumn Harvest Uprising troops led by Mao Zedong in the Jinggang Mountains in April 1928.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 由范石生的第十六军改编而来的国民革命军部队。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army formed by reorganizing Fan Shisheng's 16th Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China between 1927 and 1937.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领杨蓁之子，为报父仇而枪杀范石生。
description.en: Son of Yunnan Army general Yang Zhen, who shot and killed Fan Shisheng to avenge his father.

description.zh-cn: 滇军将领杨蓁之子，协助其兄杨维骞枪杀范石生。
description.en: Son of Yunnan Army general Yang Zhen, who assisted his brother Yang Weiqian in shooting and killing Fan Shisheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period.

description.zh-cn: 范石生曾入读云南优级师范学堂。
description.en: Fan Shisheng studied at the Yunnan Superior Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 范石生在云南优级师范学堂学习期间加入了中国同盟会。
description.en: Fan Shisheng joined the Tongmenghui while studying at the Yunnan Superior Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 李鸿祥为范石生的世交。
description.en: Li Hongxiang was a family friend of Fan Shisheng.

description.zh-cn: 范石生于1909年考入云南陆军讲武堂丙班，1911年毕业。
description.en: Fan Shisheng was admitted to Class C of the Yunnan Military Academy in 1909 and graduated in 1911.

description.zh-cn: 在云南陆军讲武堂期间结拜为兄弟。
description.en: Became sworn brothers during their time at the Yunnan Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在云南陆军讲武堂期间结拜为兄弟。
description.en: Became sworn brothers during their time at the Yunnan Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在云南陆军讲武堂期间结拜为兄弟。
description.en: Became sworn brothers during their time at the Yunnan Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 参与策划并执行了1911年10月30日的昆明重九起义，护送总司令蔡锷前往起义指挥部。
description.en: Participated in the planning and execution of the Kunming Double Ninth Uprising on October 30, 1911, and escorted Commander-in-Chief Cai E to the uprising headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 被推举为起义军总司令，领导了昆明重九起义。
description.en: Was elected as the Commander-in-Chief of the uprising army and led the Kunming Double Ninth Uprising.

position.zh-cn: 上尉连长、营长、师参谋长
position.en: Captain Company Commander, Battalion Commander, Division Chief of Staff

description.zh-cn: 范石生曾在顾品珍部任职，后因作战方案异议被免职。
description.en: Fan Shisheng served in Gu Pinzhen's unit and was later dismissed due to disagreements over operational plans.

description.zh-cn: 因对作战方案提出异议，顾品珍免去了范石生的职务并将其驱逐出滇军。
description.en: Due to Fan Shisheng's disagreement over operational plans, Gu Pinzhen dismissed him and expelled him from the Yunnan Army.

description.zh-cn: 在范石生被顾品珍驱逐后，任命其为少将参议。
description.en: After Fan Shisheng was expelled by Gu Pinzhen, Tang Jiyao appointed him as a Major General advisor.

description.zh-cn: 范石生后与杨蓁等人密谋倒唐，并参与了“援桂讨唐”军事行动。
description.en: Fan Shisheng later conspired with Yang Zhen and others to overthrow Tang Jiyao and participated in the 'Aid Guangxi, Punish Tang' military campaign.

description.zh-cn: 唐继尧率部返回云南，内外夹击将顾品珍打死于天生关鹅毛寨，重新控制云南。
description.en: Tang Jiyao led his troops back to Yunnan, launched a pincer attack, and killed Gu Pinzhen at Goose Feather Village, Tianshengguan, regaining control of Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 在孙中山号召下，范石生主张并参与了讨伐陈炯明的军事行动，并于1923年底在前线击退陈炯明部。
description.en: Under Sun Yat-sen's call, Fan Shisheng advocated for and participated in the military campaign against Chen Jiongming, and defeated Chen's forces on the front line at the end of 1923.

description.zh-cn: 因范石生在击退陈炯明部时立下战功，孙中山为其题字“功在国家”，赠与军刀，并授予上将军衔。
description.en: In recognition of Fan Shisheng's military achievements in repelling Chen Jiongming's forces, Sun Yat-sen wrote the inscription 'Merit in Service to the Nation' for him, presented him with a military sword, and conferred upon him the rank of General.

description.zh-cn: 1926年北伐前夕，范石生的部队被改编为国民革命军第十六军，范石生任军长。
description.en: On the eve of the Northern Expedition in 1926, Fan Shisheng's troops were reorganized into the 16th Army of the National Revolutionary Army, with Fan as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 应范石生要求，周恩来派遣多名共产党员进入第十六军，成立了中国共产党的组织并组建了政治部。
description.en: At Fan Shisheng's request, Zhou Enlai sent several Communist Party members to the 16th Army to establish a CPC organization and form a political department.

description.zh-cn: 范石生抵制国民党的清党运动，使其军队中的中国共产党组织得以保全。
description.en: Fan Shisheng resisted the Kuomintang's party purge, allowing the Communist Party organization within his army to remain intact.

position.zh-cn: 第十六军第四十七师副师长兼一四○团团长、第十六军总参议
position.en: Deputy Commander of the 47th Division and Commander of the 140th Regiment of the 16th Army, Chief of Staff of the 16th Army

description.zh-cn: 南昌起义失败后，朱德率残部接受范石生庇护，部队改编为第十六军一部，朱德化名王楷在军中任职。
description.en: After the failure of the Nanchang Uprising, Zhu De led his remaining troops to seek refuge with Fan Shisheng. His forces were incorporated into the 16th Army, and Zhu De, under the alias Wang Kai, held positions in the army.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正发现朱德化名藏身于范石生军中，下令范石生将其逮捕并处决。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek discovered that Zhu De was hiding in Fan Shisheng's army under an alias and ordered Fan to arrest and execute him.

description.zh-cn: 范石生违抗蒋中正的命令，秘密通知朱德离开，并赠送了数万元经费、军需装备以及一个营的兵力。
description.en: Fan Shisheng defied Chiang Kai-shek's order, secretly informed Zhu De to leave, and provided him with tens of thousands of yuan in funds, military supplies, and a battalion of troops.

description.zh-cn: 通过庇护并资助朱德及其部队，范石生为朱毛井冈山会师保存了关键的革命力量。
description.en: By protecting and financing Zhu De and his troops, Fan Shisheng preserved a key revolutionary force for the historic meeting of Zhu De and Mao Zedong in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 第十六军改编为第51师后，范石生继续担任师长。
description.en: After the 16th Army was reorganized into the 51st Division, Fan Shisheng continued to serve as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 奉蒋中正之命围剿贺龙、周逸群的中国工农红军时，仅派队尾随，不与接触，消极应付命令。
description.en: When ordered by Chiang Kai-shek to suppress the Chinese Red Army led by He Long and Zhou Yiqun, he only sent troops to follow without engaging, passively carrying out the order.

description.zh-cn: 认为是范石生导致其父杨蓁被刺杀，为报父仇，与弟弟杨维襄一同在昆明街头枪杀了范石生。
description.en: Believing that Fan Shisheng was responsible for his father Yang Zhen's assassination, he, along with his younger brother Yang Weixiang, shot and killed Fan Shisheng on the streets of Kunming to avenge their father.

description.zh-cn: 协助其兄杨维骞枪杀范石生以报父仇。
description.en: Assisted his brother Yang Weiqian in shooting and killing Fan Shisheng to avenge their father.

description.zh-cn: 杨维骞是杨蓁的儿子。
description.en: Yang Weiqian is the son of Yang Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 杨维襄是杨蓁的儿子。
description.en: Yang Weixiang is the son of Yang Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 对因枪杀范石生而被判刑的杨维骞实行特赦，使其获释。
description.en: Granted a special pardon to Yang Weiqian, who had been imprisoned for the murder of Fan Shisheng, leading to his release.
